name: Bibo
description:
The Ultimate Desktop Companion

Bibo is the AI friend you never knew you needed, like an Alexa for your computer!

Features:

  • Control your computer autonomously by talking to Bibo
  • Play games
  • Look anything up
  • Solve math problems
  • Listen to music
  • Interact with Bibo by picking him up and dropping him

Hotkeys:

  • Push to Talk:  Shift + V
  • Open Overlay:  Shift + B

Bibo is still in early development and is open to all suggestions and criticism.

Join our Discord server and help further the progression of Bibo!

https://discord.gg/Hhjy8M
